field.name: TXPWDFS
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB full-speed drivers. This turns off the current starvation sources and puts the drivers into high-impedance output

field.name: TXPWDIBIAS
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB PHY current bias block for the transmitter. This bit should be set only when the USB is in suspend mode. This effectively powers down the entire USB transmit path

field.name: TXPWDV2I
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB PHY transmit V-to-I converter and the current mirror

field.name: RXPWDENV
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB high-speed receiver envelope detector (squelch signal)

field.name: RXPWD1PT1
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB full-speed differential receiver

field.name: RXPWDDIFF
field.description: Note that this bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the USB high-speed differential receiver

field.name: RXPWDRX
field.description: This bit will be auto cleared if there is USB wakeup event while ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD bit of USBPHY_CTRL is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Power-down the entire USB PHY receiver block except for the full-speed differential receiver

field.name: D_CAL
field.description: Decode to trim the nominal 17

field.name: TXCAL45DM
field.description: Decode to trim the nominal 45ohm series termination resistance to the USB_DM output pin

field.name: TXCAL45DP
field.description: Decode to trim the nominal 45ohm series termination resistance to the USB_DP output pin

field.name: USBPHY_TX_EDGECTRL
field.description: Controls the edge-rate of the current sensing transistors used in HS transmit

field.name: ENVADJ
field.description: The ENVADJ field adjusts the trip point for the envelope detector

field.name: DISCONADJ
field.description: The DISCONADJ field adjusts the trip point for the disconnect detector

field.name: RXDBYPASS
field.description: This test mode is intended for lab use only, replace FS differential receiver with DP single ended receiver

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the output of the USB_DP single-ended receiver in place of the full-speed differential receiver

field.name: ENHOSTDISCONDETECT
field.description: For host mode, enables high-speed disconnect detector

field.name: DEVPLUGIN_IRQ
field.description: Indicates that the device is connected

field.name: ENUTMILEVEL2
field.description: Enables UTMI+ Level 2 operation for the USB HS PHY

field.name: ENUTMILEVEL3
field.description: Enables UTMI+ Level 3 operation for the USB HS PHY

field.name: AUTORESUME_EN
field.description: Enable the auto resume feature, when set, HW will use 32KHz clock to send Resume to respond to the device remote wakeup(for host mode only)

field.name: ENAUTOCLR_CLKGATE
field.description: Enables the feature to auto-clear the CLKGATE bit if there is wakeup event while USB is suspended

field.name: ENAUTOCLR_PHY_PWD
field.description: Enables the feature to auto-clear the PWD register bits in USBPHY_PWD if there is wakeup event while USB is suspended

field.name: FSDLL_RST_EN
field.description: Enables the feature to reset the FSDLL lock detection logic at the end of each TX packet

field.name: OTG_ID_VALUE
field.description: Indicates the results of USB_ID pin while monitoring the cable plugged into the Micro- or Mini-AB receptacle

field.name: HOST_FORCE_LS_SE0
field.description: Forces the next FS packet that is transmitted to have a EOP with low-speed timing

field.name: UTMI_SUSPENDM
field.description: Used by the PHY to indicate a powered-down state

field.name: CLKGATE
field.description: Gate UTMI Clocks

field.name: SFTRST
field.description: Writing a 1 to this bit will soft-reset the USBPHY_PWD, USBPHY_TX, USBPHY_RX, and USBPHY_CTRL

field.name: HOSTDISCONDETECT_STATUS
field.description: Indicates at the local host (downstream) port that the remote device has disconnected while in High-Speed mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: USB cable disconnect has not been detected at the local host

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: USB cable disconnect has been detected at the local host

field.name: DEVPLUGIN_STATUS
field.description: Status indicator for non-standard resistive plugged-in detection

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No attachment to a USB host is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Cable attachment to a USB host is detected

field.name: OTGID_STATUS
field.description: Indicates the results of USB_ID pin on the USB cable plugged into the local Micro- or Mini-AB receptacle

field.name: RESUME_STATUS
field.description: Indicates that the host is sending a wake-up after Suspend and has triggered an interrupt

field.name: OTGIDPIOLOCK
field.description: Once OTG ID from USBPHY_STATUS_OTGID_STATUS is sampled, use this to hold the value

field.name: DEBUG_INTERFACE_HOLD
field.description: Use holding registers to assist in timing for external UTMI interface

field.name: HSTPULLDOWN
field.description: This bit field selects whether to connect pulldown resistors on the USB_DP/USB_DM pins if the corresponding pulldown overdrive mode is enabled through USBPHY_DEBUG[5:4} Set bit 3 to value 1'b1 to connect the 15ohm pulldown on USB_DP line

field.name: ENHSTPULLDOWN
field.description: This bit field selects host pulldown overdrive mode

field.name: TX2RXCOUNT
field.description: Delay in between the end of transmit to the beginning of receive

field.name: ENTX2RXCOUNT
field.description: Set this bit to allow a countdown to transition in between TX and RX

field.name: SQUELCHRESETCOUNT
field.description: Delay in between the detection of squelch to the reset of high-speed RX

field.name: ENSQUELCHRESET
field.description: Set bit to allow squelch to reset high-speed receive

field.name: SQUELCHRESETLENGTH
field.description: Duration of RESET in terms of the number of 480-MHz cycles

field.name: HOST_RESUME_DEBUG
field.description: Choose to trigger the host resume SE0 with HOST_FORCE_LS_SE0 = 0 or UTMI_SUSPEND = 1

field.name: CLKGATE
field.description: Gate Test Clocks

field.name: LOOP_BACK_FAIL_COUNT
field.description: Running count of the failed pseudo-random generator loopback

field.name: UTMI_RXERROR_FAIL_COUNT
field.description: Running count of the UTMI_RXERROR

field.name: SQUELCH_COUNT
field.description: Running count of the squelch reset instead of normal end for HS RX

field.name: ENTAILADJVD
field.description: Delay increment of the rise of squelch

field.name: STEP
field.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the stepping of the RTL version

field.name: MINOR
field.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the MINOR field of the RTL version

field.name: MAJOR
field.description: Fixed read-only value reflecting the MAJOR field of the RTL version

field.name: PLL_DIV_SEL
field.description: This field controls the USB PLL feedback loop divider

field.name: PLL_EN_USB_CLKS
field.description: Enable the USB clock output from the USB PHY PLL

field.name: PLL_HOLD_RING_OFF
field.description: Analog debug bit

field.name: PLL_POWER
field.description: Power up the USB PLL

field.name: PLL_ENABLE
field.description: Enable the clock output from the USB PLL

field.name: PLL_BYPASS
field.description: Bypass the USB PLL

field.name: PLL_LOCK
field.description: USB PLL lock status indicator

register.name: USB1_VBUS_DETECT
register.description: USB PHY VBUS Detect Control Register

field.name: VBUSVALID_THRESH
field.description: Sets the threshold for the VBUSVALID comparator

field.name: VBUSVALID_TO_SESSVALID
field.description: Selects the comparator used for VBUS_VALID

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Use the VBUS_VALID comparator for VBUS_VALID results

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the Session End comparator for VBUS_VALID results. The Session End threshold is >0.8V and <4.0V

field.name: PWRUP_CMPS
field.description: Enables the VBUS_VALID comparator

field.name: DISCHARGE_VBUS
field.description: Controls VBUS discharge resistor

field.name: CHARGE_VBUS
field.description: no description available

register.name: USB1_VBUS_DETECT_SET
register.description: USB PHY VBUS Detect Control Register

field.name: VBUSVALID_THRESH
field.description: Sets the threshold for the VBUSVALID comparator

field.name: VBUSVALID_TO_SESSVALID
field.description: Selects the comparator used for VBUS_VALID

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Use the VBUS_VALID comparator for VBUS_VALID results

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the Session End comparator for VBUS_VALID results. The Session End threshold is >0.8V and <4.0V

field.name: PWRUP_CMPS
field.description: Enables the VBUS_VALID comparator

field.name: DISCHARGE_VBUS
field.description: Controls VBUS discharge resistor

field.name: EN_CHARGER_RESISTOR
field.description: Enables resistors used for an older method of resistive battery charger detection

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable resistive charger detection resistors on USB_DP and USB_DP

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable resistive charger detection resistors on USB_DP and USB_DP

register.name: USB1_VBUS_DETECT_CLR
register.description: USB PHY VBUS Detect Control Register

field.name: VBUSVALID_THRESH
field.description: Sets the threshold for the VBUSVALID comparator

field.name: VBUSVALID_TO_SESSVALID
field.description: Selects the comparator used for VBUS_VALID

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Use the VBUS_VALID comparator for VBUS_VALID results

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Use the Session End comparator for VBUS_VALID results. The Session End threshold is >0.8V and <4.0V

field.name: PWRUP_CMPS
field.description: Enables the VBUS_VALID comparator

field.name: DISCHARGE_VBUS
field.description: Controls VBUS discharge resistor

field.name: CHARGE_VBUS
field.description: no description available

register.name: USB1_VBUS_DET_STAT
register.description: USB PHY VBUS Detector Status Register

field.name: SESSEND
field.description: Session End indicator

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The VBUS voltage is above the Session Valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The VBUS voltage is below the Session Valid threshold

field.name: BVALID
field.description: B-Device Session Valid status

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The VBUS voltage is below the Session Valid threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The VBUS voltage is above the Session Valid threshold

field.name: AVALID
field.description: A-Device Session Valid status

field.name: VBUS_VALID
field.description: VBUS voltage status

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBUS is below the comparator threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBUS is above the comparator threshold

field.name: VBUS_VALID_3V
field.description: VBUS_VALID_3V detector status

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: VBUS voltage is below VBUS_VALID_3V threshold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: VBUS voltage is above VBUS_VALID_3V threshold

field.name: TESTCLK_SEL
field.description: Test clock selection to analog test

field.name: PFD_CLKGATE
field.description: This bit field controls clock gating (disabling) for the PFD pfd_clk output for power savings when the PFD is not used

field.name: PFD_CLK_SEL
field.description: This bit field for the PFD selects the frequency relationship between the local pfd_clk output and the exported USB1PFDCLK

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: USB1PFDCLK is the same frequency as the xtal clock (Default)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: USB1PFDCLK frequency is pfd_clk divided by 4

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: USB1PFDCLK frequency is pfd_clk divided by 2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: USB1PFDCLK frequency is the same as pfd_clk frequency

field.name: PFD_FRAC
field.description: PFD fractional divider setting used to select the pfd_clk output frequency

field.name: DEV_PULLDOWN
field.description: Setting this field to 1'b1 will enable the 15kohm pulldown resistors on both USB_DP and USB_DM pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The 15kohm nominal pulldowns on the USB_DP and USB_DM pinsare disabled in device mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The 15kohm nominal pulldowns on the USB_DP and USB_DM pinsare enabled in device mode

field.name: EMPH_PULSE_CTRL
field.description: Controls pre-emphasis time duration for the High Speed TX drivers after each data transition when the USBPHY_ANACTRL[EMPH_EN] bit is set high to 1'b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Minimum duration of pre-emphasis current after each data transition

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Maximum duration of pre-emphasis current after each data transition

field.name: EMPH_EN
field.description: Enables pre-emphasis for the High-Speed TX drivers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No pre-emphasis is used on HS TX output drivers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enables pre-emphasis for HS TX output drivers

field.name: EMPH_CUR_CTRL
field.description: Controls the amount of pre-emphasis current added for the High-Speed TX drivers after each data transition when the USBPHY_ANACTRL[EMPH_EN] bit is set high to 1'b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: No pre-emphasis current is enabled for the HS TX drivers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: One unit of pre-emphasis current is enabled for the HS TX drivers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Two units of pre-emphasis current are enabled for the HS TX drivers

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Three units of pre-emphasis current are enabled for the HS TX drivers

field.name: PFD_STABLE
field.description: PFD stable signal from the Phase Fractional Divider

field.name: UTMI_TESTSTART
field.description: This bit enables the USB loopback test

field.name: UTMI_DIG_TST0
field.description: Mode control for USB loopback test

field.name: UTMI_DIG_TST1
field.description: Mode control for USB loopback test

field.name: TSTI_TX_HS_MODE
field.description: Select HS or FS mode for USB loopback testing

field.name: TSTI_TX_LS_MODE
field.description: Set to value 1'b1 to choose LS for USB loopback testing, set to value 1'b0 to choose HS or FS mode which is defined by TSTI1_TX_HS

field.name: TSTI_TX_EN
field.description: Enable TX for USB loopback test

field.name: TSTI_TX_HIZ
field.description: Sets TX Hi-Z for USB loopback test

field.name: UTMO_DIG_TST0
field.description: This read-only bit is a status bit for USB loopback test results

field.name: UTMO_DIG_TST1
field.description: This read-only bit is a status bit for USB loopback test

field.name: TSTI_HSFS_MODE_EN
field.description: Setting this bit field to value 1'b1 will enable the loopback test to dynamically change the packet speed

field.name: TSTPKT
field.description: Selects the packet data byte used for USB loopback testing in Pulse mode

register.name: USB1_LOOPBACK_HSFSCNT
register.description: USB PHY Loopback Packet Number Select Register

field.name: TSTI_HS_NUMBER
field.description: High speed packet number, used when USBPHY_USB1_LOOPBACK[TSTI_HSFS_MODE_EN] is set to value 1'b1

field.name: TSTI_FS_NUMBER
field.description: Full speed packet number, used when USBPHY_USB1_LOOPBACK[TSTI_HSFS_MODE_EN] is set to value 1'b1

register.name: TRIM_OVERRIDE_EN
register.description: USB PHY Trim Override Enable Register

field.name: TRIM_DIV_SEL_OVERRIDE
field.description: Override enable for PLL_DIV_SEL, when set, the register value in USBPHY_PLL_SIC[1:0] will be used

field.name: TRIM_ENV_TAIL_ADJ_VD_OVERRIDE
field.description: Override enable for ENV_TAIL_ADJ, when set, the register value in USBPHY_DEBUG1[14:13] will be used

field.name: TRIM_TX_D_CAL_OVERRIDE
field.description: Override enable for TX_D_CAL, when set, the register value in USBPHY_TX[3:0] will be used

field.name: TRIM_TX_CAL45DP_OVERRIDE
field.description: Override enable for TX_CAL45DP, when set, the register value in USBPHY_TX[19:16] will be used

field.name: TRIM_TX_CAL45DM_OVERRIDE
field.description: Override enable for TX_CAL45DM, when set, the register value in USBPHY_TX[11:8] will be used

field.name: TRIM_PLL_CTRL0_DIV_SEL
field.description: IFR value of PLL_DIV_SEL

field.name: TRIM_USB_REG_ENV_TAIL_ADJ_VD
field.description: IFR value of ENV_TAIL_ADJ

field.name: TRIM_USBPHY_TX_D_CAL
field.description: IFR value of TX_D_CAL

field.name: TRIM_USBPHY_TX_CAL45DP
field.description: IFR value of TX_CAL45DP

field.name: TRIM_USBPHY_TX_CAL45DM
field.description: IFR value of TX_CAL45DM
